mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_NO ) A ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY CASE WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'SM' THEN 1 WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'VSM' THEN 2 WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'MGR' THEN 3 WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'CT' THEN 4 WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'EMP' THEN 5 WHEN MEMBER_GRADE = 'PT' THEN 6 ELSE 7 END, MEMBER_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE UPPER(MEMBER_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#{name}||'%') OR LOWER(MEMBER_NAME) LIKE LOWER('%'||#{name}||'%')
